website_summaries.verdict: This stylish pin, shimmering promo card, and trio of Sun & Moon booster packs are an excellent value for anyone who loves the creepy/cute Pokémon known as Mimikyu.
pros: Spooky Mimikyu enamel pin and holographic card combo
Bundled with 3 booster packs from a Sun & Moon expansion
cons: With only 140 cards in this expansion, you risk unwrapping a double or two

customer_reviews.title: Missing contents
customer_reviews.text: Empty box received. All the valuable product was gone. Clear plastic holder and outer box reviewed. For refund I get to send an empty box in the mail. Nice. The rest of my order was fully intact...
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: This is the real (very adorable) deal, and DEFINITELY not rigged!!!
customer_reviews.text: I know luck is a big factor when booster packs are involved, but my box was proof that these things are not rigged. First off the Mimikyu card has the same art as the Guardians Rising card, but with a different holo pattern and promo numbering and the pin is absolutely adorable! Thinking about getting a second box just so my wife can have one too. As for the booster packs, I ended up with a reverse Holo rare, a GX Ultra Rare and a Secret Rare! Definitely the best collection box I have opened yet!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Coxwell

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a gift, and the actual item arrived ripped in a couple of places. Not really surprised as I’ve read a bunch of horror stories from ordering Pokémon cards online. I ended up giving this set to my son. He doesn’t collect the boxes and was pretty happy to receive them. The HP is pretty low on all of these, and he has a lot of Pokémon cards to begin with (including legendary, GX, etc.)...but he didn’t have any of these. Out of all 3 booster packs, he only ended up getting one duplicate. The two stars is because of the damaged item.
customer_reviews.author: Flora

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the pin. It was roughly the price I would have paid had the pin been sold on its own. The pin is a solid enamel pin, all metal except for the textured rubber backing. I stuck it on a backpack and it's seen a lot of walking. It's still as tight as when I stuck it on. I especially like that the image used for the pin isn't the same as the one used on the box (but you can see that in the product photo).
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Mimikyu pin
customer_reviews.text: Fun set with a Mimikyu pin. I had to order two so that my son and I both could have a pin. I wish I could tell you if any decent cards came in the packs, but my son quickly mixed them in with his other cards.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Pin, Promo, and a couple of Packs
customer_reviews.text: Good condition, and mine was sent all the to japan. The promo didnt have any warping, and in the packs I got a Genesect EX full art. I just wanted the box for the promo and pin, but it's always great to know that I can actually pull something good from these kinda things.
customer_reviews.author: Zayne James

customer_reviews.title: As good as you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: The pin inside the box is really good and the packs are pretty decent as well even though I got really bad pulls from mine.
customer_reviews.author: Sunglasses Cat

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied with my order
customer_reviews.text: Extremely satisfied with my order. Came neatly packed with no issues. Pin came included with all booster packs. Would definitely order more packs.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: SUPER SKETCHY
customer_reviews.text: The box was damaged when I opened the Amazon box it came in. When I opened the box the pin was scratched up and had smudge marks. The booster packs all appeared to be resealed and the i "luckily" got a gx that was coincidentally only worth $3. This is by far the most sketchy pin box I've bought so far. I would recommend buying the pin used instead cause atleast it would save you $10.
customer_reviews.author: Radio_Evan

customer_reviews.title: Good set for Pokémon trading card collectors
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my daughter’s collection and the pin it comes with is really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: The pin is a great quality, the promo is amazing! Although there were only 2 Sun and moon packs, there was a fates collide as well. I got two great pulls out of three packs! Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Setsuki Hakubin

customer_reviews.title: Sealed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a Christmas gift for my brother and it came factory sealed
customer_reviews.author: Mysty May

customer_reviews.title: Great pulls
customer_reviews.text: Was well worth the $15 the pin and 3 pks were great, got awesome pulls including a mega alakazam ex beyond thrilled
customer_reviews.author: Mehaden

customer_reviews.title: Package came unopened in perfect condition. A cool foil card
customer_reviews.text: Package came unopened in perfect condition. A cool foil card, plus 3 booster packs and a cute Mimikyu pin. Definitely get your moneys worth! I also got two day shipping and it came right on time.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The pin is super cute. My kids were very happy with the cards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved this. This is her favorite pokemon right now
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this. This is her favorite pokemon right now.
customer_reviews.author: 3MS

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love collecting Pokemon cards and I wasn't disappointed with a lot of these. The pin is now home on my backpack, too! Hopefully it lasts a while ;u;
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Love the pin
customer_reviews.text: Purchased just for the pin so any cards were just a bonus
customer_reviews.author: Ian Rencsak

customer_reviews.title: Pin was messed up.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sad the pin was mess up. It looks like this was open and was messed with and put back in the box.
customer_reviews.author: jessica w.

customer_reviews.title: Would work with seller again
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product however my daughter said GameStop had it for a less amount. That's _if they had it in stock. Overall she loves this set.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived exactly as described. The pin is super cute. No idea what the card selection inside is like as it's a birthday present for my son this weekend. Hopefully it's a good array of cards. 5 stars just for the pin alone.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: despite my worries from ordering cards online, the packaging was good and i received the product fast. everything remained in tact, and i even managed to pull a gx out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Racheal

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: the box was resealed. you can tell that it was opened previously
customer_reviews.author: Kristin E. Pirozzi

customer_reviews.title: Box was opened no pin.
customer_reviews.text: No pin in the box, it was open when received. Cards still there. Very unprofessional.
customer_reviews.author: Karlov

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Birthday gift for my daughter, but the package was torn and damaged. Quite irritating for $13.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Bent cards!!
customer_reviews.text: The package was slightly bent, the promo card out of place and bent, and the packs an odd shape.
customer_reviews.author: Laila Caudill

customer_reviews.title: I love this box
customer_reviews.text: I love this box! The promo and pin are so nice. Really great quality. I did ok with the pulls too!
customer_reviews.author: Dorobozaru

customer_reviews.title: Like to collect the pins
customer_reviews.text: Undamaged box, came with more recent packs! Like to collect the pins.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Cool pin!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this just for the pin and promo cards. No good pulls from the packs.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D

customer_reviews.title: Great pin
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you would expect of the item. The pin is reasonable quality and awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb

customer_reviews.title: The package was easily delivered and was nothing wrong with the package itself
customer_reviews.text: The package was easily delivered and was nothing wrong with the package itself!! This was really worth the money and I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my spooky pin!
customer_reviews.text: The holo is weird on the Promo. It's soft and muted which fits the spooky Mimikyu very well. The pin is good quality. It's details reflect the Pokemon exactly. I had decent luck with the packs and pulled a holo.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley G.

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 IGN, best Pokémon ever
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, 100% legit. Perfect for any Mimikyu fan, or Pokémon fan in general.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Alice

customer_reviews.title: bought 3, ALL HAD BAD PULLS!
customer_reviews.text: Buy Singles instead, bought 3 of these and wasted my money!!! Not a Single GX or EX in those 9 packs?!?!?! The promo cards isn't playable and the pins only worth $3...so you do not get your money's worth. Get the Tapu koko one instead, the promo in that is at least worth $5...
customer_reviews.author: 2000robot

product_meta.title: Pokemon TCG: Mimikyu Premium Collection Box Featuring A Special Mimikyu Pin
product_meta.description: A Disguised Pokemon Appears! Lonely little Mimikyu dresses up as Pikachu because it wants to make lots of new friends like you! With the Mimikyu Pin Collection, you get Mimikyu both as a fun collector's pin and as a totally disguised foil promo card! Take the crafty road to victory with Mimikyu! This PokemonTCG: Mimikyu Pin Collection includes: - A never-before-seen foil promo card featuring Mimikyu! - A collector's pin featuring Mimikyu! - 3 Pokemon TCG booster packs - A code card for the Pokemon Trading Card Game Online
feature_bullets: GIVE YOUR COLLECTION A BOOST: Includes 3 booster packs containing 10 cards each to advance your collection to a new level.
UNLEASH ALL NEW POWER: An exclusive foil promo card featuring Mimikyu included with every blister pack to strengthen your deck.
BECOME THE GREATEST TRAINER: Will you find Solgaleo-GX, Lunala-GX, Decidueye-GX, Incineroar-GX, Primarina-GX, or Gumshoos-GX?
GOTTA CATCH THEM ALL: The Pokemon Sun & Moon expansion brings over 140 brand new cards to collect. Will you find them all?
SHOW OF YOUR POKEMON PRIDE: With a special Mimikyu Pin included.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars213 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
